title: I GOT A JOBBBBB
body: MY FIRST JOB YAY, TIME TO SPEND IT ALL ON RIOT POINTS G_G WP

replies.body:
Curious, anyone feel free to jump in. What was the first thing you bought (if anything) from the League store? Something you just had to have.

Mine was Headhunter Nid. Man that cat form was sick.

Edit: Also congrats on the job friend!
I bought Riven because I fell in love with her at level 5 and couldn't stand waiting to get enough IP to to play her again!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yZUtHlE7,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-05T00:02:49.891+0000)
>
> Curious, anyone feel free to jump in. What was the first thing you bought (if anything) from the League store? Something you just had to have.
> 
> Mine was Headhunter Nid. Man that cat form was sick.
> 
> Edit: Also congrats on the job friend!

I'm not sure. I was... celebrating my first paycheck and was intoxicated beyond belief. I THINK it was all the ahri skins but... I'm not really sure. All I know is I woke up with about half of my 100$ of RP that I vaguely remembered purchasing gone.
first thing i bought from the store was pentakill mordekaiser after i got a pentakill with him. ever since then hes been my main man in league.
{{champion:82}} hue hue hue hue
If I remember correctly, I bought Lucian. I tried him during a free week, then I threw money at my screen because who doesn't want a tragic badass who dashes around killing stuff?

> [{quoted}](name=CausticDeceiver,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yZUtHlE7,comment-id=00040010,timestamp=2015-02-05T02:27:56.483+0000)
>
> If I remember correctly, I bought Lucian. I tried him during a free week, then I thre money at my screen because who doesn't want a tragic badass who dashes around killing stuff?

MAN. Lucian's login screen sold me on him so hard. He looked like such an epic badass.
That music, it made me go "move over Vayne".
Robot unicorn attack Hecarim. Damn I felt hot running around in my glorious rainbow killing rampage.
Have to say it has been a blast reading everyone's responses. Pretty cool to see what everyone picked upfirst. So many different answers!
I bought shaco and almost every skin for him ^.^ I love the jester, now i just need workshop shaco and then I will buy masked and royal
i don't remember exactly what i first bought from the store, but i know one of the first things i bought was Statue of Karthus.  Why?  BECAUSE 'MURICA!
Freiljord Ashe was on sale for 260 RP.
Little Knight Amumu

Astronaut {{champion:17}}

Yes, I do worship our Dark Lord, Ruler of the Shadows, Emperor of Darkness, Satan. What'd you expect? ^_^
Rugged Garen. I thought he looked hot...
MIne was the vel koz bundle when he first came out. Since then i have spent $400 on rp. Wow.
I... Don't remember. :( Maybe Hextech Singed? I've been playing since before season 1. Maybe you could tell me what my first purchase was!
Nightmare cho... back in 2009. :|
Sorceress Lux with RP and Lux with IP. I used to love lux and I still do, cause she wrecks in ARAM.

Dark Crystal Ryze was my first purchase with RP, since the skin had just come out and I owned Ryze.

Ashe was my first purchase with IP, considering I MASTERED her after the tutorial levels.
battlecast{{champion:101}}
Justicar Syndra. I fell in love with that skin. I still love it. Syndra is still one of my favorite champions even if I don't play her much anymore. Now to get Pool Party Leona B)
I think the first thing I actually bought with RP was to get Pentakill Karthus when the VU came out.

For me it was the midnight ahrI skin. My first champ I bought and had to get her a skin. Now I buy skins for my mains constantly. Have all the skins for ahri, nid, kat, diana, lux lol! Release the new skins already please. :)
Gentleman Cho'gath. Cho was my first main and I wanted that skin once I learned he actually talked like a fancy monster. Then so began my adventure into getting champion skins.

Dreadknight Nasus, Man, back in the day that was the most bad ass champion skin. A giant dog running around with a big Axe and that massive shoulder pauldron. Man, I sucked at Nasus so hard but that skin made me not care and I mained him anyway.

I think I got Ghost Bride {{champion:25}}, because it was the first skin that I absolutely loved for both the ingame look and the splash art. And it was such a lovely splash! It's probably still my favorite skin, even now. 

Also, it just seemed fitting to get my first skin on Morg, who was one of the first champs I latched onto when I joined the game. She taught me how to skillshot properly, and may be the reason why mid became my favorite role.
I got Nami on sale because I really liked her concept.  I had a 74% win rate with her in ranked season 4 :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yZUtHlE7,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-05T00:02:49.891+0000)
>
> Curious, anyone feel free to jump in. What was the first thing you bought (if anything) from the League store? Something you just had to have.
> 
> Mine was Headhunter Nid. Man that cat form was sick.
> 
> Edit: Also congrats on the job friend!

Arcade Miss Fortune. Her personality(s) were too good to pass up.
teemo come at me guys yes i bought satan and his partner in crime heimerdinger cuz back than i loved to annoy the heck outa game with a annoying champ and who better than them
That green Kayle skin. I miss 2010

If I remember correct,y.. the first thing I bought with RP was Kha'zix. I was so impatient to try out all these awesome champs! I went over each and every champion's abilities, scaling, watched spotlights, youtube guides, guides on lolking/mobafire, etc. etc. just so I could find out which champs I wanted to get first.

Kha'zix ended up my first choice because I loved everything about him. He had an awesome jump, he EVOLVED MIDGAME?!?!?!?!?! He had range, he had INVISIBILITY?!??! and he was an ASSASSIN?!?!?!?!?!?!??!!?!?! 

I was SO excited when I bought him. I filled up 3 match history's worth of games with him in a row! I still love him! ^^
I've been {{champion:99}} main ever since I started playing so getting her the Sorceress skin was an obvious choice. The new splash art is too cute to resist!

Ummm...what was it. You just had to make it the "first" thing. lol. 2 years ago op. With crap memory. Uhhh...hmmm... I remember wanting Star Wars Yi. Only skin I like from him. Funny enough, I got it from a mystery gift. lol. Might've been Tundra Warwick or Ghost Bride Morgana. I remember really wanting those early on, but I don't know if it was the first thing I got.

Man, I wish I could keep track of all my purchases. but the League store only keeps track of the last 3 months =/ Trying to keep track of all my RP purchases, too. but the League store doesn't say the amount I bought. I think I got $50 a couple times, and not sure how many $100RP I got. hmmm. Maybe...5... Darn. Should've kept better track of it sooner.
Congrats on the job by the way thats always awesome although try to keep a positive mind and dont go on hating work since you will be there a lot lol. Anyways best of luck :D
Grats dude. I just got me a job as well, after a long ass time of unemployment.
Ugh still unemployed, but actively seeking...all the jealousy lol

I've been unemployed for a while too.  Just got a great offer Tuesday.  

Keep trying, something good will turn up when you least expect it.  It works that way for pretty much everyone!{{item:3111}}
I think I bought Frosted Ezreal. Then my wallet went downhill from there lol. xD
Gratz!
Nurse Akali{{champion:84}} , ever since i first saw it, I have been dying for that skin. Don't look at me like that :(.

First RP purchase for me was Pantheon.  I was new, I was terrible, I was only playing vs bots, and Pantheon was the only champ i had much success killing other champs with.  I didn't understand the role of support / tanks, so a more offensive-oriented champ appealed to me as a beginner.
First thing I bought was an IP Boost, and Ive had one rolling almost consistently in the 1.5 years ive been playing this awesome game! The first skin I bought was most certainly Valkyrie Leona.
And now you will have no time for lol. RIP OP

Riot employees be like...

http://media.247sports.com/Uploads/Assets/13/999/2999013.jpg
Blood moon Kalista. Brought the champion with 6300 ip and the skin for 975 rp when it was in a bundle...

Congrats on the Job! I spent my very first pay check buying one pack of every MtG set available and opening them in the car on the way home from Church. But I think if LoL was around I would have saved some for that Haunted Nocturne skin :P
Headless hecarim... Did not realize it was legacy so I'm still kinda salty bout dat
A champion(ken at the time 5 years ago) because IP prices are insane :)
